properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM PHOTOS WHERE PHOTO_STATE = 0

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT PHOTO_ID , PHOTO_NAME , PHOTO_SALE , PHOTO_PRICE , PHOTO_CREATEDAT , PHOTO_STATE , PHOTO_SRC , PHOTO_INFO , PHOTO_UPDATEAT , CATEGORY_ID , USER_NAME , USER_NICKNAME FROM PHOTOS P JOIN USERS ON(P.USER_NO = USERS.USER_NO) WHERE P.PHOTO_STATE = 0 ORDER BY PHOTO_CREATEDAT DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT PHOTO_ID , PHOTO_NAME , PHOTO_SALE , PHOTO_PRICE , PHOTO_CREATEDAT , PHOTO_STATE , PHOTO_SRC , PHOTO_INFO , PHOTO_UPDATEAT , CATEGORY_ID , USER_NAME , USER_NICKNAME FROM PHOTOS P JOIN USERS ON(P.USER_NO = USERS.USER_NO) WHERE P.PHOTO_STATE = 0 AND CATEGORY_ID = ? ORDER BY PHOTO_CREATEDAT DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

INSERT INTO PHOTOS ( PHOTO_ID , PHOTO_NAME , PHOTO_SALE , PHOTO_PRICE , PHOTO_SRC , PHOTO_INFO , PHOTO_UPDATEAT , USER_NO , CATEGORY_ID ) values ( PHOTO_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , ? )
